page.title: 01Description of D block
page.content: The block is to the N.E. of Preston. The S.W. corner of the block takes in a very small area of the Brookfield estate which is mainly council housing. Just outside Preston, on the east side of the road to Grimsargh(which is in theN.E. corner of the block) is the Red Scar industrial estate. This is on the site of the old Courtaulds factory. On the West side of the road is the Rough Hey Industrial estate. Part of the Red Scar site is given over to a Crematorium. A disused railway runs through the area and at one time used to serve Courtaulds.The M6 motorway runs through the area. Most of the land is devoted to farming - the western part mainly for hay making and the eastern part for grazing for dairy cattle. Part of the area is wooded Grimsargh is in the N.E. corner.
